author: buscob
msg: Used the new CommonButtonBarMenu in the ProfileSubTabBar and CommSubTabBar menus in the Party application.

author: buscob
msg: Added a new common menu "CommonButtonBarMenu". This should be extended to create the screens button menus.
Right now many of the button menus are written using container and link widgets.
Whenever some of them is replaced with a menu widget a CommonButtonBarMenu extension will ensure the proper menu styles.
